messages.title: DEMAND BETTER THAN A TORY BREXIT
messages.content: Tory Cabinet papers reveal no-deal Brexit will result in higher prices and shortages of fuel, food and medicine ... and rising costs in social care, whilst Johnson says, 'I'd rather be dead in a ditch' than delay Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats want a People's Vote and an Exit from Brexit.
Demand Better for the environment, require deliverable action on climate change.
Ensure that every person has the opportunity to follow their aspirations by having a fairly funded education system.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats can stop the Conservatives and Brexit Party here.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats are the largest, strongest Remain party. We want a People's Vote and an Exit from Brexit. Demand Better than a Tory Brexit.
issues.education: Ensure that every person has the opportunity to follow their aspirations by having a fairly funded education system.
issues.environment: Require deliverable action on climate change.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Thatcham all my life and have been active in the Newbury and Thatcham community since I was 15 years old. My wife and I both work locally, and our children go to local schools. As residents of Newbury constituency, we demand better from our government on the issues we face locally and nationally. I'm proud to put myself forward to continue to represent my community and make the changes needed to benefit everyone.
leaflet.additionalNotes: European Election 2019 result in West Berkshire shows only the Liberal Democrats can stop the Conservatives and Brexit Party.
